main.p: Out of the 2021 Endings symposium we produced a special issue of the Digital Humanities Quarterly entitled Project Resiliency. Our presenters turned their presentations into full articles for the special edition. An additional article focused on technical considerations and the software and site build processes developed by the Endings team was be contributed by Martin Holmes and Joey Takeda, and a summary of the methodological foundations for our interview process was contributed by Emily Comeau The special edition was edited by Janelle Jenstad, Martin Holmes, and Matt Huculak.
